actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for United Nations Security Council Resolution 385 which calls for an end to South Africa's illegal administration of the Territory of Namibia.

summary.text: Expresses Congressional support for United Nations Security Council Resolution 385 (Termination of South Africa's mandate over Namibia).

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for United Nations Security Council Resolution 385 which calls for an end to South Africa's illegal administration of the Territory of Namibia.
